Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw blinked, speechless for a few seconds. "Someone's going have to 
explain all this. But at least it's good to hear that Megatron is on the 
run." She laughed. "Now he knows how it feels to be hunted!"

>Injector sighed.  The female robots were always the dumbest it seemed.  
>"Hell
>Beast has more minions.  Many more.  He's overpowered Megatron a few times.
>They've had unsteady truces numerous times.  Now is just one of them.  Soon
>we'll probably end up hunting him down and hopefully I may get the pleasure
>of giving his head to Hell Beast on a pike."
